scikit - learn and xgboost.from sentence: We use scikit - learn and xgboost [ 25 ] , the machine learning libraries for Python , to implement all the ML classifiers ( RF , XGB , SVM , MNB , and LR ) and the MLP .

PyTorch.from sentence: We use PyTorch to implement the LSTM classifiers described earlier .

to regularize.from sentence: In order to regularize the hidden space of the LSTM classifiers , we use a shut - off mechanism , called dropout , where a fraction of neurons are not used for final prediction .

randomly split.from sentence: We randomly split our dataset into a train ( 80 % ) and test ( 20 % ) set .

LSTM classifiers.from sentence: The LSTM classifiers were trained on an NVIDIA Titan X GPU for faster processing .

stop.from sentence: We stop the training when we do not see any improvement in validation performance for > 10 epochs .
